physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#203 Weinberger Family of Arizona, 1887-1963 B 13 B17 B 18-2 prints B21 - 4 prints B24 - 2 check copy of buggy photo for info." Handwritten on back of photograph: "No. 7, Delegates to Arizona Constitutional Convention, October 10, 1910, Jacob Weinberger was the youngest delegate, #203."

mods.abstract: Delegates to the Arizona Constitutional Convention pose outside a large building while others look down at them from a second story balcony. Jacob Weinberger was the youngest delegate.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
